seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Gadgets & Tech Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: How does your tech gadgets store compare? See pagespeed score benchmarks from 41 Shopify gadgets & tech stores. Median: 48, Top 10%: 65.

key_findings: The average Gadgets & Tech store scores 48 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 65+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 36 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Gadgets & Tech Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 41 Shopify stores in the tech gadgets industry, measuring pagespeed score.
